messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Theoretically speaking, if one of our scientists got mad we fired him and made the largest meth grenade in history what would happen if he hid it on your station?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: That announcement we made earlier about theoretically having a big meth grenade on your station wasn't actually theoretical, we lied. Somewhere hidden on the station is a big grenade full of meth. Please dispose of it.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.
